WRITING.TEXT:
my brother was about five and my dad asked us what we wanted for breakfast and my bro said "cereal with ketchup!" so my dad gave him that and made him eat it. He started crying because it was horrible and he was hungry so my dad made him sit on the floor and eat it. And he had it again at lunch when he couldn't eat it, so I ate it in the end. It made me sick. Not eaten ketchup since I was six
why do parents humiliate their kids like this ! glad things are btter for you now
i'm thinking about dying it back to red. it was a sort of darker red really so not ginger-ginger, but enough to get my lip split

ginger person here. also very pale, green-blue eyes, freckles.
I got beaten up at school by the popular girls once, because I was ginger. people didn't want to sit with me at lunch bc I was unpopular because of my hair : --- ) I dye it now
